issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
TabGroups has 2 tabs but the label on the page states that TabGroup has 5 tabs.
This is not regression since the issue occurs on 3.1.1 GA as well

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to KS> BASE UI>TabGroups
2. Observe the screen

Actual:
There are two tabs on the screen but the label below states," Tab Group has 5 tabs"

Expected:
If there are two tabs, label should state that Tab Group has 2 tabs
fields.summary: Android: Kitchensink - TabGroups has 2 tabs but the label on the page states that TabGroup has 5 tabs
fields.environment:
SDK:3.1.2.v20130723170106
Appcelerator Studio: 3.1.2.201307171817
OS: OSX 10.7.5
Device:Google nexus 7 (v 4.2.1)

TabGroups has 5 tabs 
1.Base UI
2.Controls
3.Phone
4.Platform
5.Mashaps

What you mentioned are buttons.
Marking as invalid.
